title: Does UNCW have someone in responsible for the upkeep of the landscaping in front by hwy. 132? As a local citizen, I am concerned that students and their families in our area for the first time are not being impressed when they see the lack of upkeep.  Vines and other unsightly plants are hiding the beautiful plants we want them to see.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=16071
